AD_Minsc_Combat_04.synopsis: Minsc fights as the Stone Lord and is enraged

AD_MinscSeesNaheiraDie_WithJaheira.synopsis: Minsc reacts with anger after seeing Naheira die
AD_MinscSeesNaheiraDie_WithJaheira.how_to_trigger: CTY_Main_Actrl-shift-7Recruit Jaheiractrl-shift-7-> Minsc-> Abandoned CIstern-> Go to Roah BribeFight the fight kill Naheira

AD_MinscDied_BooAngry.synopsis: Boo squeaks in anger as Minsc dies
AD_MinscDied_BooAngry.how_to_trigger: CTY_Main_AOrigin debugbook (ctrl shift 7)MinscAbandoned CisternGo to Roah BribeGo through conversation into combatKill Minsc

RoahBribe.synopsis: After Minsc's successful heist at the Counting House, the player can encounter Minsc and Roah making a deal. The player has the opportunity to interfere here and save Minsc.
RoahBribe.how_to_trigger: Enter the office at the back of the Abandoned Cistern

PAD_Neighbourhood.synopsis: Voice Bark about the kind of "neighbourhood" Astarion usually prefers. When players enter in this part of the sewers, Astarion will say this comment.
PAD_Neighbourhood.how_to_trigger: Entering to S_LOW_MinscHideout_VB_Neighbourhood_123920b0-7013-49dc-9412-cffbc2d258be with Astarion in the party.

AD_SluiceGuardsBeforeHeist.synopsis: Two cultists guarding Minsc's hideout discuss their leader's heist and the Zhent leader waiting for the boss' return
AD_SluiceGuardsBeforeHeist.how_to_trigger: Enter the Minsc's Hideout  and observe the cultists guarding the Sluice gate before completing the Counting Houselarian://bookmark?name=CTY_UC_MinscHideout&mod=GustavDev&level=CTY_Main_A&camPos=-249.169617;82.351547;862.876221&camTarget=-249.108841;81.364174;863.022522

AD_SavingBoo.synopsis: Minsc calls out to Boo as he attempts to save his beloved companion
AD_SavingBoo.how_to_trigger: Save Minsc from the Absolute's influence by knocking him out and then talking to him while in the Abandoned Cistern

AD_MinscSeesTwoJaheiras.synopsis: Minsc ADs to seeing a second Jaheira and expresses confusion and rage.
AD_MinscSeesTwoJaheiras.how_to_trigger: CTY_Main_Actrl-shift-7Recruit Jaheiractrl-shift-7-> Minsc-> Abandoned CIstern-> Go to Roah BribeFight the fight

PAD_RelicMazzy.synopsis: Minsc reminisces about the past after player interacts with an item in his hidden lair:A warhammer (Mazzy)

AD_Minsc_Combat_02.synopsis: Minsc fights as the Stone Lord and is enraged

PAD_Jaheira_PleadingSaveMinsc.synopsis: Jaheira informs the player to keep Minsc alive

PAD_NoticeWater.synopsis: The player notices the polluted water in the Abandoned Cistern and points out that it's dangerous
PAD_NoticeWater.how_to_trigger: Approach the water in the Abandoned Cistern

AD_Minsc_Combat_03.synopsis: Minsc fights as the Stone Lord and is enraged

PAD_RelicJan.synopsis: Minsc reminisces about the past after player interacts with an item in his hidden lair:A turnip (Jan)

AD_MinscDied_BooSad.synopsis: Boo squeaks sadly as Minsc has died
AD_MinscDied_BooSad.how_to_trigger: CTY_Main_AOrigin debugbook (ctrl shift 7)MinscAbandoned CisternGo to Roah BribeGo through conversation into combatKill Minsc

PAD_SluiceValveOverloading.synopsis: Player reaction to the sluice puzzle not going very well:The water or heat is overloading.
PAD_SluiceValveOverloading.how_to_trigger: CTY_Main_ATeleport to S_LOW_MinscHideout_NoticeSluiceValveTrigger46aa0f2c-a60e-4333-8073-00babd8d577aOpen the valves and let the valves overload

AD_FoundBoo.synopsis: Minsc is excited and relieved that he found Boo
AD_FoundBoo.how_to_trigger: Break the wall that Boo is trapped behind. Minsc will approach Boo and AD

AD_SluiceGuardsAfterHeist.synopsis: Two cultists guarding Minsc's hideout discuss the meeting between him and the Zhent leader after the Counting House Heist
AD_SluiceGuardsAfterHeist.how_to_trigger: Enter the Minsc's Hideout  and observe the cultists guarding the Sluice gate after the Counting Houselarian://bookmark?name=CTY_UC_MinscHideout&mod=GustavDev&level=CTY_Main_A&camPos=-249.169617;82.351547;862.876221&camTarget=-249.108841;81.364174;863.022522

AD_Minsc_Combat_01.synopsis: Minsc fights as the Stone Lord and is enraged

SluiceGuard.synopsis: The Bhaal cultists guarding Minsc's Hideout spot the player and get ready to attack. The player has a brief moment to try and trick the cultists into standing down
SluiceGuard.how_to_trigger: Get spotted by the Bhaal Cultists outside the sluice gate at

PAD_SluiceValveFixed.synopsis: The player has solved the Sluice valve puzzle and responds.

PAD_Jaheira_PleadingSaveMinsc2.synopsis: Jaheira informs the player to keep Minsc alive

PAD_Jaheira_MinscKnockedOut.synopsis: Jaheira calls out to the player to help Minsc
PAD_Jaheira_MinscKnockedOut.how_to_trigger: CTY_Main_ARecruit JaheiraCompanion debug book (ctrl shift 7)- Minsc- Abandoned Cistern - Go to Roah BribeRun through dialog to start fight.Knock out Minsc (non lethal)killcombat

PAD_RelicDynaheir.synopsis: Minsc reminisces about the past after player interacts with an item in his hidden lair:cracked wooden mask (Dynaheir)

JaheiraDoppelganger.synopsis: Jaheira's Doppelganger hangs around after her deal with Roah. If she spots the player then she will fire off a quip before attacking
JaheiraDoppelganger.how_to_trigger: Speak to Jaheira's Doppelganger after allowing her and Roah to conclude their deal

PAD_RelicKeldorn.synopsis: Minsc reminisces about the past after player interacts with an item in his hidden lair:A mailed fist (Keldorn)

AD_MinscSeesNaheiraDie.synopsis: Minsc reacts with anger after seeing Naheira die
AD_MinscSeesNaheiraDie.how_to_trigger: CTY_Main_Actrl-shift-7-> Minsc-> Abandoned CIstern-> Go to Roah BribeFight the fight kill Naheira

PAD_Jaheira_MinscDies.synopsis: Jaheira yells out as she sees Minsc die/dead
PAD_Jaheira_MinscDies.how_to_trigger: CTY_Main_ARecruit JaheiraGo to Abandoned Cistern and start Roah bribe scene, kill Minsc and have Jaheira see the body

AD_SluiceGuards_Conversation.synopsis: One time dialog between 2 sluice guards when the player stealths near.The sluice guards are wondering why the stone lord looks like Minsc.

PAD_NoticeSluiceValve.synopsis: Player notices that the valve controlling the sluice gate is jammed

PAD_Jaheira_YellsAtMinsc.synopsis: Jaheira yells at Minsc to stop being an idiot while fighting him as the Stone Lord.
PAD_Jaheira_YellsAtMinsc.how_to_trigger: CTY_Main_ARecruit JaheiraGo to Abandoned Cistern and start Roah bribe scene

PAD_RelicAerie.synopsis: Minsc reminisces about the past after player interacts with an item in his hidden lair:A pair of wings (Aerie)

AD_Minsc_Combat_04_0.speaker: Minsc
AD_Minsc_Combat_04_0.text: You cannot defeat the Absolute. You can only wail, and die!

AD_MinscSeesNaheiraDie_WithJaheira_0.speaker: Minsc
AD_MinscSeesNaheiraDie_WithJaheira_0.context: NodeContext: Minsc is raging - his Stone Lord persona should be genuinely frightening. The player has just killed the doppelganger pretending to be Jaheira.

AD_MinscSeesNaheiraDie_WithJaheira_1.speaker: Minsc
AD_MinscSeesNaheiraDie_WithJaheira_1.text: What...? Jaheira, you look a little... strangesome...
AD_MinscSeesNaheiraDie_WithJaheira_1.context: NodeContext: Mid-battle, 'Jaheira' was just killed before you but she morphed back into doppelganger form. Still fighting under the influence of the Absolute, but confused - a hint player is going in the right direction to save him

AD_MinscDied_BooAngry_0.speaker: Boo
AD_MinscDied_BooAngry_0.context: NodeContext: Boo is standing beside Minsc's corpse, squeaking vengeance.

RoahBribe_26.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Wide shot of Minsc, Doppel-Jaheira and Roah mid-discussion. [Table between them optional.]
Establishing shot to mask player's approach from multiple potential angles.

RoahBribe_5.text: Hurry up, Zhent. Our guards are dead - this place is already compromised.
RoahBribe_5.context: NodeContext: Playing Jaheira's evil doppelganger - notably nastier, more tense - hurrying the Zhent along to take their coin and go.

RoahBribe_25.speaker: Roah Moonglow
RoahBribe_25.text: All the coin seems to be there, if a little blood-stained. You lot are enthusiastic about your Lord's work.

RoahBribe_7.speaker: Boss Friol
RoahBribe_7.text: All the coin's there - my thanks. It sounds like you made quite a mess getting it, too - all in a day's work for the Lord of Murder, eh?

RoahBribe_12.text: Our Lady. We serve only the Absolute.

RoahBribe_21.speaker: Roah Moonglow
RoahBribe_21.text: Silly me. We Zhentarim are so long past our own godly roots, I'm afraid I forget the half of them.

RoahBribe_15.speaker: Roah Moonglow
RoahBribe_15.text: But you, I know. When did you start worshipping gods? Did they give your wee rodent a worm friend, too?

RoahBribe_18.speaker: Boss Friol
RoahBribe_18.text: Of course. Been years since we Zhentarim dabbled in god worship - so easy to get them all mixed up.

RoahBribe_8.speaker: Boss Friol
RoahBribe_8.text: And you, big man. When did you start worshipping gods? Did they give your wee rodent a worm friend, too?

RoahBribe_3.speaker: Minsc
RoahBribe_3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Holding his head, a little confused - not fully remembering

RoahBribe_24.text: Enough. You will show the Stone Lord proper respect. And you will return to the Guildhall and do as we have paid you to.

RoahBribe_23.speaker: Narrator
RoahBribe_23.text: *And suddenly, another presence looms in your mind. Another tadpole.*

RoahBribe_22.speaker: Minsc
RoahBribe_22.text: Some sneak-thief lurks nearby. The same one I sensed in the Counting House.

RoahBribe_28.speaker: Minsc
RoahBribe_28.text: I CAN TASTE YOUR THOUGHTS, COWARD! COME OUT, SO I MAY SPILL THEM ON THE GROUND!

RoahBribe_11.speaker: Minsc
RoahBribe_11.text: Ah. Well. Perhaps I only needed to sneeze.
RoahBribe_11.context: NodeContext: Immediate lurch from towering rage to bemused shrug.

RoahBribe_2.speaker: Roah Moonglow
RoahBribe_2.text: And on that note... pleasure! Look for word from the Guildhall.

RoahBribe_13.speaker: Boss Friol
RoahBribe_13.text: My Zhent are in position at the Guildhall. We'll send word when the job is done.

RoahBribe_17.speaker: Minsc
RoahBribe_17.text: Flop all you wish, little fish - but Minsc has caught you.
RoahBribe_17.context: NodeContext: Relish - he's about to strike.

RoahBribe_27.speaker: Roah Moonglow
RoahBribe_27.text: On that note - good luck! The job will be done by the time you get to the Guildhall.

RoahBribe_33.speaker: Boss Friol
RoahBribe_33.text: Right. I'm sure you have all of this in hand - we'll see you in the Guildhall when the job is done!

RoahBribe_16.speaker: Narrator
RoahBribe_16.text: *And suddenly another presence looms in your mind: searching, probing for a tadpole... and finding none.*

RoahBribe_32.speaker: Boss Friol
RoahBribe_32.context: NodeContext: Non-chalant - but backing off from her provocations.

PAD_Neighbourhood_2.speaker: Player
PAD_Neighbourhood_2.text: I knew my return to Baldur's Gate wouldn't be glamorous, but this is a little much.

PAD_Neighbourhood_0.speaker: Player
PAD_Neighbourhood_0.text: This place stinks. It's enough to make a statue weep.

AD_SluiceGuardsBeforeHeist_1.speaker: Barnz
AD_SluiceGuardsBeforeHeist_1.text: To be left behind while our brothers and sisters hunt - it is an insult.
AD_SluiceGuardsBeforeHeist_1.context: NodeContext: annoyed - you've been left on guard while your comrades go off on a hunt

AD_SluiceGuardsBeforeHeist_4.speaker: Cilarea
AD_SluiceGuardsBeforeHeist_4.text: This operation demands subtlety, brother. Not your peculiar form of devotion.

AD_SluiceGuardsBeforeHeist_2.speaker: Barnz
AD_SluiceGuardsBeforeHeist_2.text: The Stone Lord has proven an effective instrument. A surprise, that he was not drawn to worship Lord Bhaal.

AD_SluiceGuardsBeforeHeist_7.speaker: Cilarea
AD_SluiceGuardsBeforeHeist_7.text: He is a berserker. His life has been spent worshipping our Lord whether he wills it or not.

AD_SluiceGuardsBeforeHeist_3.speaker: Barnz
AD_SluiceGuardsBeforeHeist_3.text: How many of her Faceless has Lady Orin sent out to walk among us?

AD_SluiceGuardsBeforeHeist_6.speaker: Cilarea
AD_SluiceGuardsBeforeHeist_6.text: That is not for us to know, brother. Any of devoted we speak to might be one of them - or the Lady Orin herself.

AD_SluiceGuardsBeforeHeist_5.speaker: Barnz
AD_SluiceGuardsBeforeHeist_5.text: The Faceless grows weary of her current form - did you see her this morning?

AD_SluiceGuardsBeforeHeist_0.speaker: Cilarea
AD_SluiceGuardsBeforeHeist_0.text: Slashing at her own face in the mirror. Doppelgangers are not meant to wear the same skin for too long - especially one so offensive to our Lord as that one.
AD_SluiceGuardsBeforeHeist_0.context: NodeContext: Referring to the doppelganger masquerading as Jaheira.

AD_SavingBoo_0.speaker: Minsc
AD_SavingBoo_0.text: Hang on! Minsc is on his way!

AD_SavingBoo_1.speaker: Minsc
AD_SavingBoo_1.text: I am the most wretched of wretches. Most villainous of villains. A great, big, fool.

AD_SavingBoo_2.speaker: Minsc
AD_SavingBoo_2.text: Where are you?! Squeak, so I might know you are well!

AD_MinscSeesTwoJaheiras_0.speaker: Minsc
AD_MinscSeesTwoJaheiras_0.text: Jaheira! You have an evil, much uglier twin sister? Minsc does not like this!
AD_MinscSeesTwoJaheiras_0.context: NodeContext: Minsc's only moment of confusion in the combat - he sees the real Jaheria, and turns to the doppelganger Jaheira in confusion.

PAD_RelicMazzy_0.speaker: Player
PAD_RelicMazzy_0.text: What a hammer - looks like it has a history, too.

AD_Minsc_Combat_02_0.speaker: Minsc
AD_Minsc_Combat_02_0.context: NodeContext: Minsc's raging war-cry while he fights as the Stone Lord - in this form, he should be genuinely frightening

PAD_Jaheira_PleadingSaveMinsc_0.speaker: Jaheira
PAD_Jaheira_PleadingSaveMinsc_0.text: Do not kill him! Find another way - please.
PAD_Jaheira_PleadingSaveMinsc_0.context: NodeContext: Grim, shouting at us as combat starts

PAD_NoticeWater_0.speaker: Player
PAD_NoticeWater_0.text: That water looks tainted. Better to avoid it.

AD_Minsc_Combat_03_0.speaker: Minsc
AD_Minsc_Combat_03_0.text: Sword, boot - evil will taste both!
AD_Minsc_Combat_03_0.context: NodeContext: Minsc's raging war-cry while he fights as the Stone Lord - in this form, he should be genuinely frightening

AD_MinscDied_BooSad_0.speaker: Boo
AD_MinscDied_BooSad_0.context: NodeContext: Boo is nestled beside Minsc's corpse, confused and sad.

PAD_SluiceValveOverloading_0.speaker: Player
PAD_SluiceValveOverloading_0.text: Ah. That... does not sound encouraging.

AD_SluiceGuardsAfterHeist_0.speaker: Barnz
AD_SluiceGuardsAfterHeist_0.text: No mistakes now. The boss won't wants no interruptions while the Zhent is here.

AD_SluiceGuardsAfterHeist_5.speaker: Cilarea
AD_SluiceGuardsAfterHeist_5.text: Heh. Do you mean the Stone Lord, or the real boss?
AD_SluiceGuardsAfterHeist_5.context: NodeContext: Mocking Stone Lord - they both know the real boss is the doppelganger who controls him.

AD_SluiceGuardsAfterHeist_1.speaker: Barnz
AD_SluiceGuardsAfterHeist_1.text: Why do we even need the Zhentarim? They worship nothing but their own fattened purses.

AD_SluiceGuardsAfterHeist_2.speaker: Cilarea
AD_SluiceGuardsAfterHeist_2.text: Avarice and self-interest. Instruments of the Lord of Murder, wouldn't you say?

AD_SluiceGuardsAfterHeist_6.speaker: Cilarea
AD_SluiceGuardsAfterHeist_6.text: And what of the Stone Lord, when all of this is done?

AD_SluiceGuardsAfterHeist_3.speaker: Barnz
AD_SluiceGuardsAfterHeist_3.text: Perhaps Lady Orin will reacquaint him with our Lord. They are old friends, after all.
AD_SluiceGuardsAfterHeist_3.context: NodeContext: Relish at the prospect of Minsc being sacrificed to Bhaal.

AD_SluiceGuardsAfterHeist_7.speaker: Barnz
AD_SluiceGuardsAfterHeist_7.text: Did you hear the boss is finally meeting with those mercenaries?

AD_SluiceGuardsAfterHeist_4.speaker: Barnz
AD_SluiceGuardsAfterHeist_4.text: Yeah, best stay out of their way.

AD_SluiceGuardsAfterHeist_8.speaker: Barnz
AD_SluiceGuardsAfterHeist_8.text: I will not miss sleeping in this arena-sized chamber pot. Our Lord of Murder should have his will worked beneath the sun.

AD_Minsc_Combat_01_0.speaker: Minsc
AD_Minsc_Combat_01_0.context: NodeContext: Minsc's raging war-cry while he fights as the Stone Lord - in this form, he should be genuinely frightening

SluiceGuard_0.text: Just as I was getting bored - our Lord sends us a little diversion.

SluiceGuard_1.text: Bhaal below... it's the false Chosen. One who would die by our hand is unworthy indeed.

PAD_SluiceValveFixed_0.speaker: Player
PAD_SluiceValveFixed_0.text: Right. That seems to have worked.

PAD_Jaheira_PleadingSaveMinsc2_0.speaker: Jaheira
PAD_Jaheira_PleadingSaveMinsc2_0.text: This will not end until we knock him out.
PAD_Jaheira_PleadingSaveMinsc2_0.context: NodeContext: Grim, shouting at us during combat

PAD_Jaheira_PleadingSaveMinsc2_1.speaker: Jaheira
PAD_Jaheira_PleadingSaveMinsc2_1.text: Finish the others, but spare Minsc - your Prism can still save him!
PAD_Jaheira_PleadingSaveMinsc2_1.context: NodeContext: Grim, shouting at us during combat

PAD_Jaheira_PleadingSaveMinsc2_2.speaker: Jaheira
PAD_Jaheira_PleadingSaveMinsc2_2.text: Do not kill him! Find another way - please.
PAD_Jaheira_PleadingSaveMinsc2_2.context: NodeContext: Grim, shouting at us during combat

PAD_Jaheira_PleadingSaveMinsc2_3.speaker: Jaheira
PAD_Jaheira_PleadingSaveMinsc2_3.text: He'll fight to the death if we let him - do not let it come to that!
PAD_Jaheira_PleadingSaveMinsc2_3.context: NodeContext: Grim, shouting at us during combat

PAD_Jaheira_MinscKnockedOut_0.speaker: Jaheira
PAD_Jaheira_MinscKnockedOut_0.text: He will not stay down for long - do something, before he is lost to us forever!

PAD_Jaheira_MinscKnockedOut_1.speaker: Jaheira
PAD_Jaheira_MinscKnockedOut_1.text: Quickly - we do not know how long he has. Help him!

PAD_Jaheira_MinscKnockedOut_2.speaker: Jaheira
PAD_Jaheira_MinscKnockedOut_2.text: Minsc, stay with us. We have to hurry!

PAD_RelicDynaheir_0.speaker: Player
PAD_RelicDynaheir_0.text: Nice mask - what's the story here?

JaheiraDoppelganger_0.text: Stone Lord - we have some uninvited guests. See them out.
JaheiraDoppelganger_0.context: NodeContext: Calling on her minion to kill us after we interrupted a business meeting.

AD_MinscSeesNaheiraDie_0.speaker: Minsc
AD_MinscSeesNaheiraDie_0.context: NodeContext: Minsc is raging - his Stone Lord persona should be genuinely frightening. The player has just killed the doppelganger pretending to be Jaheira.

PAD_Jaheira_MinscDies_0.speaker: Jaheira
PAD_Jaheira_MinscDies_0.context: NodeContext: Grief and sadness, trailing off - we just killed her friend in self-defense

AD_SluiceGuards_Conversation_3.speaker: Barnz
AD_SluiceGuards_Conversation_3.text: The Stone Lord - you know who he really is?

AD_SluiceGuards_Conversation_1.speaker: Kevo Phogge
AD_SluiceGuards_Conversation_1.text: Doesn't much matter, does it? He serves us, now. Serves Lady Orin.

AD_SluiceGuards_Conversation_2.speaker: Barnz
AD_SluiceGuards_Conversation_2.text: He's done well in clearing the Guild from these tunnels. Perhaps he'll be rewarded - elevated.
AD_SluiceGuards_Conversation_2.context: NodeContext: A little concerned for their position in the hierarchy.

AD_SluiceGuards_Conversation_0.speaker: Kevo Phogge
AD_SluiceGuards_Conversation_0.text: You're mistaken. We are faithful servants. He is a toy. And when Lady Orin is bored with her toys, well... she breaks them in creative ways.
AD_SluiceGuards_Conversation_0.context: NodeContext: Confident, hinting at Minsc's gruesome fate to come.

PAD_Jaheira_YellsAtMinsc_0.speaker: Jaheira
PAD_Jaheira_YellsAtMinsc_0.text: Think, you idiot! For once, just bloody THINK!
PAD_Jaheira_YellsAtMinsc_0.context: NodeContext: Frustrated, concerned for her friend - wants him to stop fighting us, though she knows shouting alone is futile.
